review: Convenient, easy to use, and well-priced. Would recommend.
author: Noah B. French

review: Love my fire stick. Wasn't sure about buying one. I'm not tech savey. Glad I did . It is easy to use and gives me so much more.
author: Paula

review: The Fire Stick works pretty good, the problem that I had was how to put it to sleep I could not find any information on how to do it. I ended up pulling the Fire Stick from the HDMI, I watched couple movies and the look really good. I would like to see Amazon Prime to have more selection on movies just like Netflix because if you have to pay for every movie even old movies. I think it's not what I expected, but the Stick so far works find, add more tutorials regarding this matter. I could give a 4 star if he wasn't for the problem on how to put it to sleep. I forgot the settings for the Fire Stick was very simple, no problem in that area.
author: J. Armando

review: Easy setup and great video image.
author: Kathy Grady

review: The Firestick was easy to set up and so simple to use. I would definitely recommend this to anybody who streams movies and games.
author: lisa welsh

review: I love having so many movie options at my fingertips. Easy to connect. Pleased with purchase.
